entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Wekweeti
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:29 a.m. MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Freezing rain over southern sections this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 6:29 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:29 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
